Description:
More Bang For Your Buck!
This fantastic quality, Simonds-built brick home offers first home buyers, downsizers and savvy investors an affordable entry point into the highly sought after Geelong market place. Centrally located to all of the must have amenities including the CBD, Eastern Beach, multiple Shopping Centre's, medical clinics, Primary, High Schools, The Gordon Tafe, Bellarine bike trail and plenty of public transport- all moments away.
This modern, low maintenance, three bedroom, two bathroom, single storey townhouse offers a spacious family friendly floor plan with open plan living, dining, kitchen zone comprising contemporary quality finishes throughout. The open plan living area is comfortably carpeted and the functional kitchen comprises stainless steel appliances, including gas stove, electric oven, dishwasher, ample storage and a bonus brekky bar.
The spacious master bedroom offers a large ensuite bathroom and a walk-in wardrobe, whilst the additional bedrooms feature built in robes and are serviced by a modern central bathroom with stand-up shower, bath, vanity and a separate toilet.
Additional extras include solar electricity and hot water, split system, gas wall heater, ceiling fans, quality blinds and curtains throughout the entire home, security system, single lock-up garage, landscaped frontage and a paved rear court yard with new fences. This really is an ideal place to call home or a fantastic set and forget investment option to add to your portfolio. With rental potential at $300 - $320 per week, and positioned in a family friendly street, this one won't last long, inspection is a must!
Settlement 60 Days - 10% Deposit, contact agent for other arrangements.
Insights: 30a Orbit Drive, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2017 and 30 other 3 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
IDEAL INVESTMENT OR FIRST HOME
This modern one owner home is the ideal first home, downsize or investment opportunity and provides a private and secure living environment in this most convenient court location.
The home features three bedrooms, two bathrooms and two living areas, all in as new condition. The main bedroom has an ensuite and walk in robe, two further bedrooms are serviced by a second bathroom.
The well equipped kitchen opens to a generous dining and living room and overlooks and opens to the rear garden. A second lounge room allows flexible living and opens to a separate private courtyard.
Further features double lock up garage, heating, air conditioning and great proximity to local shops, public transport, schools and sports facilities.

Description:
Opportunity Awaits
This neat 3-bedroom, 2 bathroom home situated in a great pocket of Whittington is close to shops, primary / secondary schools, public transport and only 5 minutes from Geelong CBD and South Geelong train station. Sitting on an 842m2 block this property has huge subdivision potential all (STCA). Main bedroom includes walk-in robe , walk-through ensuite. 2 living areas, central bathroom and kitchen that adjoins the dining & second living area, looking over outdoor entertainment area, this home is perfect if you are wanting your 1st home or investment property. Other features include, single garage and plenty of space to do what you will. This home is a must inspect!

Description:
A fresh start with endless opportunities
First home buyers, young families or the astute investor will be impressed by the open floor plan and how neat and tidy this home presents. Consisting of 3 bedrooms and a central bathroom the home has been freshly painted throughout with a neutral colour palette - allowing your imagination to run wild with colour ideas and furniture options. Positioned on approx 604 sqm’s the spacious backyard provides endless opportunities for further expansion, a place for kids to play or possible subdivision (STCA). East Geelong primary school and “The Gordon institute” are all within minutes walk. Local shops, public transport and other sporting facility are all in close proximity with Geelong’s CBD and waterfront only a short drive away. A much loved family home that will surely impress.

Description:
Renovated, Refreshed, Revived!
This immaculate and newly renovated brick home is perfect for those looking an affordable entry into the local Geelong market or the perfect investment property for tenants to simply move in and put the feet up. Found in a handy location close to Wilsons Rd and a short drive to Newcomb Shopping precinct. Beautiful polished timber floors flow throughout whilst the entire homes has been freshly painted both inside and outside. You will feel right at home with the brand new modern kitchen, complete with stainless appliances, new bench tops, new lighting and overlooking the adjoining meals area. A spacious lounge offers split system air con and plenty of north facing light. Four bedrooms with robes, all serviced by a fully remodelled bathroom offers a modern palate. Outdoors offers spacious front and rear laws ideal for the kids, with an excellent oversized single lock-up garage.

Description:
Original Victorian Homestead on a Quarter Acre!
Set back from the street hidden amongst tall trees and gardens, this beautiful Victorian home will certainly delight the eye. The home has been refurbished whilst retaining many period features including decorative cornices, ceiling roses arched hallway and weather board frontage with original iron lace work & wrap around veranda.
Boasting 4 large Brms all with OFP, inc master with WIR & ensuite, 12 ceilings, PFBs, Baltic pine kitchen with S/S app, spacious open family area with gas central heating and evaporative cooling, study and modern bathroom with corner spa. Outside displays a quiet a stunning deck area, water feature, paved courtyard, secure car port, DLUG with workshop and further off street parking all on a huge (approx 1100 sqm) block.
This home has everything the family could need, the original Homestead of the area.

Description:
Family home for the Boat and Caravan
Move in and enjoy this spacious family home located within walking distance to local shopping facilities and schools.
Comprising large open plan kitchen/dining/lounge room with adjacent study nook, three large bedrooms with BIR's, master with WIR and ensuite, updated family bathroom with bath, separate toilet, SLUG, single carport and garden shed.
Featuring stylish updated kitchen with gas cooking and Beko dishwasher, gas heating, split system air conditioning, heaps of storage and ceiling fans throughout.
The dining area leads directly onto an ambient outdoor entertaining deck enjoying the outlook of the established low maintenance garden. Enjoy the seasons with the well established fruit trees and vegie patches while still having enough room to park the boat, caravan or tradie trailer, situated on a huge 737m2 approx. allotment.
An ideal, quiet location and ready to move in family home... enjoy.

Description:
Amazing opportunity in fantastic location!
This quaint 2-bedroom weatherboard cottage sits in a convenient central location and is priced to sell. Located close to schools, sporting facilities, public transport and approximately 10 minutes by car from Geelong's CBD, it's a superb opportunity for a first homebuyer or astute investor.
Charming cottage features include vintage sash windows, high ceilings, a faux fireplace mantle in the master bedroom and polished floorboards in the bedrooms and kitchen area.
Bedrooms sit at the façade with bright picture windows. The country-style kitchen/diner features a stainless steel cooker in the original fireplace and a dishwasher. Fresh white cabinetry provides ample storage. At the rear, the spacious living area sits under a raked ceiling and features a split system AC effective throughout. Timber French doors flow to the back garden and provide a lovely indoor-outdoor ambiance.
The shower room boasts a large shower, vanity, toilet and laundry facilities.
The north facing backyard features a handy garden shed and is ideal for outdoor entertaining.
Seize this opportunity to purchase in a convenient position with high rental demand. This is a great toehold into the Geelong market!
- Quaint 2BR weatherboard cottage in a convenient central location
- Approx. 10' to Geelong's CBD, close to schools, sporting facilities, public transport
- Spacious living with spit system AC and French doors to the garden
- Country-style kitchen/diner and shower room with laundry facilities
- Modern refurbishment and charming original features
- A superb opportunity for a first homebuyer or astute investor
Insights: 6 other 2 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

With a single garage and additional side access for boat or trailer this great home won't be on the market for long. A must inspect!

Description:
CALIFORNIAN BUNGALOW ON LOW MAINTENANCE ALLOTMENT
Stylish Character home in a very desirable area of Whittington. Comprising two spacious bedrooms, one extremely large bedroom with robes, flexible floor plan two designated living areas if desired and dining area. Timber kitchen with plenty of cupboard space, central heating and also air conditioning. Separate bathroom and laundry with additional shower.
Conveniently located around the corner from Bellarine village and public transport nearby. With some improvements this Character home could be returned to its former glory.

Description:
Amazing Opportunity
This brand new quality built home offers first home buyers or the savvy investor an amazing opportunity into the Geelong market place. Centrally located to all of the must have amenities including Newcomb?s two Shopping Centre?s, Medical Clinics, Primary, High Schools and The Gordon Tafe?, Swim and Sport Centre, plus bike trails all just moments away.
This wonderful three bedroom two bathroom single story townhouse offers a spacious open plan living, dining and kitchen zone with contemporary quality finishes throughout. The kitchen is complete with stainless steel appliances, including gas stove and dishwasher and features gorgeous stone bench tops, breakfast bar and ample storage.
The master bedroom offers - walk in robe and ensuite, with the two additional spacious bedrooms comprising built in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom which includes a stand up shower, bath, vanity and separate toilet.
Additional extras include ducted heating, a single remote lock up garage, landscaped frontage with a stunning façade and much more. This Townhouse is an easy buy to live in or add to the portfolio as a low maintenance, set and forget investment with rental potential of $300 - $320 per week or 5.2% per annum. Vendor says sell!
